author: Brian Heater
title: Coffee Meets Bagel raises a $12M for international expansion and live events
description: Coffee Meets Bagel scored a $12 million Series B this week. The round, led by UK VC firm Atami Capital, brings the popular dating app’s total up to just under $20 million, since launching back in 2012. The San Francisco-based dating app has worked to distinguish itself from competitors like Bumble …
